# flow wk

Returns the weekly flow for a stock (options expiring that Friday). /flow wk

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/flow wk [ticker]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker - Not required for subcmd: unu | True | None |


---

## Examples

```python
/flow wk AMD
```

---
